features: REPAIR HAIR FROM THE INSIDE: Want strong and deeply nourished hair? Nexxus Humectress Ultimate Moisture Conditioner for Dry Hair is designed to help rescue and visibly repair dry hair
LOCK IN MOISTURE, UNLEASH SMOOTH HAIR: With Elastin Protein and Green Caviar, this moisturizing conditioner will leave your hair feeling silky smooth and help retain natural movement
ULTIMATE MOISTURE THERAPY: Transform dry locks into smooth and shiny locks, as if you just came from the salon. Nexxus Conditioner is a deep conditioner that helps moisturize and renew hair
SALON-CRAFTED HAIR CARE: Nexxus moisturizing conditioner helps replenish and repair hair, leaving it revitalized without weighing it down, giving it flexibility and suppleness every day
SEE THE SCIENCE: Nexxus knows hair structure consists of up to 90% protein, so Nexxus scientists used leading-edge research to create this conditioner that provides 24-hour moisture for dry hair
NEXXUS HAIR CARE PRODUCTS: Nexxus Therappe & Humectress is a salon quality moisturizing shampoo, conditioner and hair mask designed to provide moisture for up to 24 hours to dry hair.
body.description: Nexxus Humectress Ultimate Moisture Conditioner for dry hair is a deeply hydrating conditioner that provides the ultimate moisturization to hair. Salon-crafted with Green Caviar and Elastin Protein, this conditioner helps restore lost nutrients to hair, fortifying the surface of hair to help lock in moisture for 24 hours, when paired with the Nexxus Therappe Ultimate Moisture Shampoo. In addition, Nexxus Humectress Ultimate Moisture Conditioner provides advanced conditioning to help replenish and reawaken hair, unleashing your hair’s natural smoothness all day long.Repairing hair is a multi-step process. For best results, use the Nexxus Humectress Ultimate Moisture Conditioner with a moisturizing shampoo, like the Nexxus Therappe Ultimate Moisture Shampoo, for an ideal moisturizing shampoo and conditioner pair. To use, apply Moisture Shampoo to damp hair, massaging into a rich lather before rinsing thoroughly. Follow with the Humectress Moisturizing Conditioner, smoothing onto wet hair and waiting 3 minutes before rinsing. Humectress Ultimate Moisture Conditioner is suitable for everyday use.A leader in salon-quality hair products, Nexxus uses learnings from science and nature. We know that hair is made of almost 90% proteins, which is why we use advanced scientific methods to identify the protein needs of each hair type and create customized formulas with proteins to bring your hair back to life.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nexxus Humectress Conditioner locks in moisture to unleash your hair's smoothness. Salon crafted with caviar and a Protein Complex for 24-hour moisture, this advanced conditioner treats each hair fiber and retains natural movement.

The Science Though advanced protein science, Nexxus treats hair with rehydrating essential nutrients to replenish hair fiber. The Ingredients Featuring a ProteinFusion blens of elastin protein & green caviar for ultimate deep moisture. The Result Nexxus delivers salon quality result with Therappe & Humectress, locking in moisture to unleash your hair's smoothness.

Nexxus Therappe Shampoo, 33.8 oz Nexxus Humectress Intensely Hydrating Masque, 1.5 oz Nexxus Humectress Multi-Benefit Leave-In Spray, 9 oz Main Benefit Nexxus Therappe Shampoo with our exclusive ProteinFusion blend with Elastin Protein and Green Caviar, cleanses normal to dry hair to leave ir feeling nourishes and moisturized. Nexxus Humectress Intensely Hydrating Masque, with our exclusive ProteinFusion blend with Elastin Protein and Green Caviar, intensely moisturizes to target dry spots and give balance throughout. Nexxus Hummectress Multi-Benefit Leave-In Spray, with our exclusive ProteinFusion blen with Elastin Protein and Green Caviar, primes, protects nourishes, and strengthens hair with every use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shampoo and conditioner!!!
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice, quality shampoo that's kind many hair textures, types and hairs many changes. Its thick, creamy and smells like coconuts and suntan oil I used to love. It's fairly strong however there's an unscented. My hair felt, looked, felt better first use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was using Biolage as I have loved it for many years. Biolage was drying my hair out. I decided to get this for I wanted something that conditioned well and smelled really good. I have been using it for a month and my hair texture improved noticeably. Would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This has made a very nice difference to my hair. Smoother, softer, less breakage, less frizz. The only thing I don’t love is the smell. The first several times using it I had to remind myself I was not sick because it smells just like amoxicillin to me and instantly took me back to being sick as a child!! Haha!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Curly hair double approved!
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I both have long curly hair (3A and 2A, respectively) amd when I say this is the BEST conditioner I have found for our hair, I'm not kidding. I've tried mamy different conditioners from popular brands, all claiming to be hydrating and good for curly hair but this one takes the cake! At an affordable pricw too, with a lot of product and it also smells very clean and refreshing. Definitely buying again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My hair looks a lot less dry than before and its easier to manage, and doesnt break the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner works great and makes your hair very soft! I used to use Pantene but this is way better!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the few conditioners that detangles my hair enough that I can comb right through it after rinsing. It leaves my hair very soft and shiny, and at a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells great and truly helps repair hair and make it soft
Este acondicionador junto con su shampoo son excelentes, para pelo rizo y seco
Prodotto fantastico!!!! Eccellente anche per gli impacchi!!!!

J adore l odeur du conditioner il le plaît beaucoup je l utilise la marque nexxus depuis longtemps mais j avais de plus en plus du mal a le retrouver ça reste la meilleure marques du shampoo et conditioner pour avoir les cheveux saines et brillante.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 30, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: Used with Nexxus Reconstructor this made a miraculous improvement in condition
reviews.reviewText: Last week I lost a lot of my long, thick, healthy hair following a trauma. What was left was 'thin' and crunchy with no volume and shine. My stylist recommended a good reconstructor and such was my desperation that I bought the first one I saw on Amazon - Nexxus. I read the reviews, liked what I read and pressed the buy button for Nexxus Emergency Reconstructor and Nexxus Humectress Ultimate Moisturizing Conditioner.The results are truly stunning; unbelievably good; my hair looks vastly thicker and more volumised and I even have beautiful silkiness, shine and movement that are even better than before. I am utterly thrilled with Nexxus products and will keep up fortnightly treatments. I now feel brave enough not only to go out but to feel good about my hair. To impress on you the qualities of the Nexxus Reconstructor and this Nexxus Humectress conditioner, I am happy to share the fact that I'm a mature lady this side of 70 who can truly say that I've never had better quality hair. I'm one very happy customer. Thank you Nexxus.
